name: Babcock Forceps
specifications: Stainless steel; curved tip without teeth; fenestrated jaws; length 16â€“20 cm.
function: Used for grasping delicate tissue such as intestines, fallopian tubes, or vessels during surgical procedures.
usage: Wear sterile gloves; hold by finger rings; gently grasp tissue with minimal pressure to avoid trauma.
maintenance: Clean and sterilize after each use; inspect hinges for smooth operation; store in a dry, sterile environment.
warning: Excessive force causing tissue injury; improper sterilization leading to infection.
